org.passay

Class LowercaseCharacterRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.passay.AbstractCharacterRule
      • org.passay.LowercaseCharacterRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterRule, Rule

    public class LowercaseCharacterRule
extends AbstractCharacterRule
    Rule for determining if a password contains the correct number of lowercase characters. Characters are defined in CHARS.
    Author:
    Middleware Services

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CHARS
      Lowercase characters, value is "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz".
      static String ERROR_CODE
      Error code for insufficient number of characters of particular class.

      • Fields inherited from class org.passay.AbstractCharacterRule

        numCharacters

      Returns the characters in the supplied password that matched the type for the implementing class.

      Returns the error code used in the RuleResultDetail.

      Returns the characters that are considered valid for this rule.
